title: Xbox LIVE Event Registrations
description: This is the place to register for current Xbox LIVE events, including Xbox LIVE Play & Wins, Xbox LIVE Download & Wins and Xbox LIVE Tournaments.  Register for your favorite Xbox LIVE event by simply downloading the matching registration gamerpic.  Don’t forget to check out the rules for your Xbox LIVE event for full details including how to earn entries as well as prize details.

childDownloads.title: Hunger Games Registration Theme
childDownloads.description: NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Open only to legal U.S. residents (inc. D.C.), 18+. Ends at 11:59 p.m. PT on 3/25/12. For alternate methods of entry, visit www.xbox.com/hungergamessweepstakes

childDownloads.title: Marines Registration Theme
childDownloads.description: Downloading this theme registers eligible gamers for the Marines Sweepstakes. NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Open only to legal residents of the 50 US or DC ages 17-29. Entry Period Starts: 09:01 a.m. Pacific Time (PT) on 06/02, and ends at 11:59 p.m. PT on 07/01. By downloading this item, you are allowing Microsoft to contact you from time to time about this Sweeps. For details including free, alternate method of entry, see http://www.xbox.com/marines. By downloading the Marines registration theme you agree to receive a one-time email communication from Xbox and the US Marines. Your existing Xbox communication preferences will not be changed.

childDownloads.title: Nokia Lumia 900 Registration Theme Pack
childDownloads.description: Downloading this theme pack enters eligible gamers for the Nokia and Xbox LIVE Sweepstakes. NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Open only to legal U.S. residents (inc. D.C.), 18+. Ends at 11:59 p.m. PT on 6/30/12. For alternate methods of entry, see Official Rules at www.xbox.com/NokiaLumia900

childDownloads.title: Xbox Ultimate Gamer Recall Fantasy Sweepstakes
childDownloads.description: Download the Total Recall theme for a chance to win a trip to meet a game developer and the chance to battle it out with a pro.  You could also win a signed Xbox 360 and a custom designed Xbox LIVE theme.  Don’t have an Xbox LIVE account? Send an email, with your name, address, phone number, and age to totalrecall@xboxpromotions.com for entry.  Open only to legal residents of the 50 US or DC, 18+. Ends at 11:59 p.m. PT on 8/5/12. See Official Rules: www.xbox.com/TotalRecallSweepstakes
